title: TWEE Mason's Planets Sidewalk Chalk Solar System
description:
Drawing on the sidewalk reaches new levels with Twee Sidewalk Chalk - Solar System: Mason's Planets. This gorgeous nine piece set features 3 large and 6 small planets that resemble real ones, including unique colors with cores, layers, and crusts. Even Pluto makes an appearance! The 3 large planets--Saturn, Uranus, and Jupiter--feature three colors inside, and the 6 smaller planets--Mars, Earth, Venus, Neptune, Mercury, and Pluto--have two colors. 

  • Please note that Twee chalk is intended for sidewalk use, meaning for gritty surfaces as opposed to smooth ones (like chalkboards).
  • Twee is a woman-owned and operated company based out of Philadelphia.
